formalpara.title: Figure 3: BODIPY staining after 15 minutes of feeding with HB101
formalpara.para: (A) Worm was fasted for 12 hours and refed for 15 minutes with HB101 in the presence of BODIPY (B) worm was not fasted but fed with HB101 in the presence of BODIBY for 15 minutes. Reproduced with permission from (You et al., 2008).
